title: Pumping fuel for light vehicles limited
body_lines: Issuing of fuel for vehicles will be limited at filling stations from 1.00 pm today, the Ceylon Petroleum Corporation (CPC) said.
Accordingly, fuel will only be issued for Rs. 1,000 for Motorcycles, Rs. 1,500 for three-wheelers and Rs. 5,000 for Cars, Vans, Jeeps.
However, CPC Chairman Sumith Wijesinghe said that this does not apply to Buses, Lorries and Commercial vehicles.(DSB)
